title: A Brief Illustrated Guide To Understanding Islam (21 Languages)
description:
This Islamic guide is for non-Muslims who would like to understand Islam, and the Holy Quran(Koran). It is rich in information, references, bibliography, and illustrations. It has been reviewed and edited by many professors and well-educated people. It is brief and simple to read, yet contains much scientific knowledge. 

General Editors: 
Dr. William Peachy 
Michael Thomas 
Tony Sylvester 
Idris Palmer 
Jamaal Zarabozo 
Ali AlTimimi 

Science Editors: 
Professor Harold Stewart Kuofi 
Professor F. A. State 
Professor Mahjoub O. Taha 
Professor Ahmad Allam 
Professor Salman Sultan 
Associate Professor H. O. Sindi
